metadata.name: NEVER BROKEN
metadata.description:
In every woman is a heart that is never broken! This piece is about a woman who faced many challenges in her life as the world advances. Subjects of prejudice and biases, victims of violence and abuses but still manage to rise up proud. 
We are slowly walking into the future where everything is like a new blooming flower. Just like a flower, women are majestic and deserved all the care and love we can offer.
